s: Summary: ONE OF US Lift & Coffee gathering featuring Aya, 071Labs, Cudis & Aethir, with exclusive merch for early attendees.
Topics: DeFi infrastructure, community incentives, token utility, cross‑project collaboration, reward mechanisms.
Speakers: Representatives from Aya, 071Labs, Cudis, Aethir and ONE OF US organizers.
r: Secure early‑access merch that signals community involvement.
Engage directly with project leads to explore integration opportunities.
Earn reputation points and rewards within the ONE OF US ecosystem.
